verbose_text: On the one hand, the Arabidopsis counterpart of THRx is involved in the ferredoxin / thioredoxin pathway that regulates metabolic processes in function of light and is known to activate SS1 and the beta-amylase BAM1 [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: ferredoxin/thioredoxin pathway that regulates metabolic processes in function of light and is known to activate SS1
